```{r}

```

```{r}
aL <- c(1L, 5L, -3L)
bL <- c(-2L, -4L, 8L)
```

```{r}
class(a+bL)
class(aL+bL)
class(a-bL)
class(aL-bL)
class(a*bL)
class(aL*bL)
class(a/bL)
class(aL/bL)
```
